step_feedback.feedback: Good job stretching your arm overhead. Try to keep your elbow a little straighter in future repetitions.
You're doing well with this step. Focus on keeping your arm extended overhead throughout the movement.
Excellent! You're making a good fist and tightening your muscles. Remember to exhale as you relax your hand.
Great job opening your hand and relaxing your muscles. Keep visualizing the fluid moving out of your arm.

exercise_summary: You did a great job with the overhead pumping exercise! Remember to keep your arm straight overhead and focus on making a strong fist while inhaling. Exhale as you open your hand and relax.
